msIdentifier.institution: Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland

author.persName: Anṣārī al-Harawī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad, 1006-1089
انصارى الهروى، عبد الله بن محمد

msItem.title: Munājāt
مناجات
msItem.note: Bound with Codrington/Reade No 350 (2). F1a: a) Large round seal of Ayyub khanahzad of Muhammad Shah, dated A.H. 1132 (1719-20), regnal year one. Standing next to title written in bold naskh. b) Note evidently referring to eighteenth-century restorantion mentioning 44 folios including ? written ones. There is a similar note on the verso of the last folio of No 350 (2). c) Signature of David Price. Text is a prayer. The text areas of the folios of the sixteenth-century manuscript have been remounted on blue paper decorated with ruled borders and partly sprinkled with silver. The panel of illumination above the beginning of the text is probably from the original.
msItem.incipit: Ay zi dardat bi-dilan-a darman amadah

listBibl.bibl: For Price's bequest see J.R.A.S., iii (1836), pp. xii-xiv, lx.

bindingDesc.p: Brown leather Indian binding with flap and stamped and painted decoration. The front cover detached, the flap loose.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
